DependencyItem.Message: This version of FanartHandler requires MediaPortal 1.10.0
DependencyItem.Name: MediaPortal

GeneralInfo.Name: Fanart Handler
GeneralInfo.Author: cul8er (maintained by yoavain & ajs)
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
Fanart Handler is a plugin for MediaPortal (MP). The plugin basically supports;
* Search and download music artist fanart or artist and album thumbnails (scrape) from the fanart.tv, htbackdrops, last.fm, coverartarchive site.
* for all artists stored in your MP music database.
* for any artist currently being played (on the fly).
* Push fanart that you store on your local harddrive to the current used MP skin.
* push fanart for now played music
* push fanart for selected music or movie
* push random images from selected folders

SectionParam.Name: Online Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package stored online (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Configuration file
SectionParam.Description: The file used to configure the extension. If have .exe extension the will be executed If have .dll extension used like MP plugin configuration

SectionParam.Name: Online Screenshots
SectionParam.Description: Online stored screenshot urls separated by ;

SectionParam.Name: Force to uninstall on update
SectionParam.Description: Show dialog and force to uninstall previous version when updating an extension. Should only be disabled if you are using an NSIS/MSI installer.

DependencyItem.Message: This version of FanartHandler requires MediaPortal 1.10.0
DependencyItem.Name: MediaPortal

GeneralInfo.Name: Fanart Handler
GeneralInfo.Author: ajs (maintained by yoavain, original by cul8er)
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: - Internal rework - Bug fixes - Bug fixes for multi artists on now playing - Fix for #fanarthandler.movie.studios.selected.all - Rework Pictures Slide Show when music plays + Add FanartHandler.SlideShowFolders.xml for MyPictures SlideShow (if the file is there, and it is not empty, then the folders from it, or use of my pictures) + Add #fanarthandler.pictures.slideshow.enabled (true, false) Slide show mode is activated or not Fanart Handler. If Slide show activated (#fanarthandler.pictures.slideshow.enabled = true) and #skin.fanarthandler.pictures.slideshow.enabled = true then when playing music should show your pictures but not the backdrop for an artist. + Add new tab in Configurator for SlideShow

GeneralInfo.Name: Fanart Handler
GeneralInfo.Author: ajs (maintained by yoavain, original by cul8er)
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription:
- optimization - code clean - internal rework and optimization - change Random fanart algoritm ... - speedup - bugfixes - genres rework
#fanarthandler.movie.studios.selected.all - It should work in moving pictures.
- Add: #fanarthandler.picture.backdrop1.selected #fanarthandler.picture.backdrop2.selected #fanarthandler.picture.backdrop1.selected & #fanarthandler.picture.backdrop2.selected - If a folder is selected, returns randomly first 10 pictures. #fanarthandler.music.genres.play #fanarthandler.music.genres.play.all #fanarthandler.music.genres.play.verticalall #fanarthandler.movie.studios.selected.verticalall #fanarthandler.movie.genres.selected #fanarthandler.movie.genres.selected.all #fanarthandler.movie.genres.selected.verticalall #fanarthandler.music.genres.selected #fanarthandler.music.genres.selected.all #fanarthandler.music.genres.selected.verticalall Added FanartHandler.Genres.xml thx @catavolt @azzuro Added FanartHandler.Studios.xml thx @catavolt
- Remove: #fanarthandler.picture.backdrop.selected
